HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_TITLE: Mmesola ya Sekete sa Nako e le nngwe
HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Abelana le mekgwa e amanang, mme e fella!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: E kgotlhelele, e sireletsehile le go sirelediwa ke Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Re netefatsa tshegetso e e maatla ya tshedimosetso ya gago. Datha e agiwa go ngwaga ya mekgwa. Re sitwa go itse IP ya gago, se o se abelanang le eng, le go mang o abelanang le mekgwa ya sekete - go botlhokwa, dikwalo.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: O seuleng o itse lenane la tshedimosetso e o e dirileng le gore o e abelana le mang. Fa o ntse o dira sekete, o ka oketsa paswedi pele e ka fitlhelelwa. Go bo go a kgonagala go setse nako ya burn. Le fa go ntse jalo, sekete se tla bolawa ka morago ga di 14 matsatsi.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_TITLE: E kgotlhelele go tswa go ngwaga go ya ngwaga
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Dikgwebo le dikwalo di agiwa go ngwaga ya mekgwa, go raya gore le rona re sitwa go itse lenane le dikwalo. Lenane le na le ID e amanang ya boleele jwa 36 e e amanang le go tsaya go fitlhelela Mmesola ya Sekete le dikwalo tse di agiwang ka AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Tsaya molaetsa wa gago le/gareng goba dirisa paswedi
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Tsaya le go romela molaetsa, e tla
HOME.SHARE_BULLET_3: E fitlhelelwa ka nako e le nngwe
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: E kgotlhelele, e sireletsehile le go sirelediwa ke Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Tsaya molaetsa wa gago wa Sekete, paswedi kgotsa tshedimosetso e amanang *
HOME.CREATED_SUBTITLE: Se tla bonwa go lekana le nako e le nngwe
HOME.CREATED_TITLE_SHARE: Kopa lenane goba abelana le yona.

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Dumela, o amogile molaetsa wa sekete!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Tsaya le go romela molaetsa, e tla bolawa fa e balwe.
VIEW.SHOW_MESSAGE_ONCE: Molaetsa o o latelang o tla bonwa ka nako e le nngwe fela
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Download Stellar Secret mo mobile, dira melaetsa ya gago ya sekete
VIEW.ONE_TIME_VIEWABLE: E fitlhelelwa ka nako e le nngwe
